name: Ping Pong (itch) (Anarchy Studios, K G VINEETH)
name_original: Ping Pong (itch) (Anarchy Studios, K G VINEETH)
description:
This a attempt to recreate the classic ping pong game. It is a two player where you can grab fun hours on end. We have kept the graphics to a minimum but without compromising on quality, this ensure that it will be able to run on any system without sacrificing on the experience.  We sincerely hope that you enjoy this attempt in the recreation of the most era defining games of all time. 

As always continue to stay awesome fam !!!!!!
